mapper.update: update leave_message set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, reply_user_id = #{replyUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, pid = #{pid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, leave_msg = #{leaveMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creat_time = #{creatTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where leave_message_id = #{leaveMessageId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select leave_message_id, user_id, reply_user_id, pid, leave_msg, creat_time from leave_message
select leave_message_id from leave_message where pid = 0
SELECT u.user_id,u.username,u.head_portrait ,lm.leave_message_id,lm.leave_msg,lm.creat_time FROM leave_message lm LEFT JOIN user u on lm.user_id = u.user_id where lm.leave_message_id = #{id}

SELECT u.user_id,u.username,u.head_portrait ,lm.leave_message_id as comment_id, lm.leave_msg as comment_msg,lm.creat_time,lm.reply_user_id FROM user u, leave_message lm WHERE u.user_id = lm.user_id and lm.pid = #{pid}
